mapper.sql: SELECT bno , title , content , writer , view_cnt , comment_cnt , reg_date , up_date FROM board
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY bno) AS rownum, bno , title , content , writer , view_cnt , comment_cnt , reg_date , up_date FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC , bno DESC LIMIT #{offset} , #{pageSize}
